section.para: Represents one of possibly multiple translations of a headword. Examples: , .
section.programlisting: headwordTranslation: <string> language: (0..1) <langCode> listingOrder: (1..1) <number> partOfSpeech: (0..n) <string> label: (0..n) pronunciation: (0..n) inflectedForm: (0..n)

section.title: SQL

listitem.para: language indicates the language of this translation. You can use the translationLanguage datatype to explain the meaning of the language codes that appear here and/or to constrain which language codes are allowed.
If ony one translation language exists in your lexicographic resource, then language can be left out.
For more comments see comments under headwordTranslation in the Bilingual Module.
